title: ninai manamE
sahitya:
ninai manamE muruganai dinamOr muraiyEnum nI


anupallavi

  manaiviyODum makkaLai maTrumuLLa shuTrattai maravAdiruppadu pOl siridEnum inimEl nI


caraNam    tuNaiyAga irundunnai tIvinaiyE aNugAmal aNaivOr avanukku iNaiyAvOr illai
paNivOraip parivODu pAlikkum aruLODu taNikait-talam Evum dIna dayAsindhuvai nI
